name: CO-TERMINUS
description:
Welcome to CO-TERMINUS!

You friend Viggo has been captured while he was trying to steal some tech from a research lab, find Viggo and escape this mysterious lab with him.

Keyboard base commands:

Left/right arrow: Move.

up/down arrow: Look up/down and interact.

E: Interact.

Spacebar: Jump.

X: Keep key pressed to heal.

Gamepad base commands:

Left stick: Move/Look/interact.

Button south: Jump.

Button east: Keep pressed to heal.

Resources:
